briefTitle: Dosing Flexibility Study of Oral Testosterone Undecanoate (TU, LPCN 1021)
officialTitle: Dosing Flexibility Study of Oral Testosterone Undecanoate (TU, LPCN 1021) in Hypogonadal Men.
summary: This is a multicenter, open-label, one treatment study evaluating the efficacy of LPCN 1021 in adult hypogonadal male subjects.

primaryOutcome.measure: Percent of LPCN 1021-treated Subjects Who Achieve a Total Testosterone Average Concentration [Cavg] in the Normal Range
